Package io.github.frc5024.lib5k.control_loops

Class PIDv2

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.frc5024.lib5k.control_loops.PIDv2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sendable
    @Deprecated(since="October 2020",
            forRemoval=true)
public class PIDv2
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sendable
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    An implementation of team 1114's SimPID, that works with lib5k's kinematics systems, and provides telemetry
